casebody.data:
Antonio GARCIA, Appellant,
v.
GOVERNMENT EMPLOYEES INSURANCE COMPANY, Respondent. No. 148 SSM 37 Court of Appeals of New York. Decided December 14, 2017 Shayne, Dachs, Sauer & Dachs, LLP, Mineola (Jonathan A. Dachs of counsel), for appellant. Law Offices of Richard A. Fogel, P.C., Islip (Richard A. Fogel of counsel), for respondent.

***1034On review of submissions pursuant to section 500.11 of the Rules, order affirmed, ***1035with costs. There is no ambiguity in the policy as to coverage or divisibility. The parties contracted for $2 million of coverage. Plaintiff's remaining contention lacks merit. **207Chief Judge DiFiore and Judges Rivera, Stein, Fahey, Garcia, Wilson and Feinman concur.
